name: Neeko
subtitle: the Curious Chameleon
description: Hailing from a long lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others, even absorbing something of their emotional state to tell friend from foe in an instant. No one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be, but those who intend to do her harm will soon witness her true colors revealed, and feel the full power of her primordial spirit magic unleashed upon them.

abilities.name: Inherent Glamour
abilities.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

abilities.name: Blooming Burst
abilities.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

abilities.name: Shapesplitter
abilities.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.

abilities.name: Tangle-Barbs
abilities.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
